actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 223 of the Flood Control Act of 1970 to provide compensation for certain employees of the Burlington Northern, Inc., due to the construction of the Libby Dam, Montana.

summary.text: Provides compensation for employees of the Burlington Northern, Incorporated working on the railroad route relocated as a result of the construction of the Libby Dam, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 223 of the Flood Control Act of 1970 to provide compensation for certain employees of the Burlington Northern, Inc., due to the construction of the Libby Dam, Montana.
